1468955466453508099.name: The Cephalopod Citizen Science Project
1468955466453508099.tweet: Octopuses change their skin texture using papillae, which you can see clearly in this photo. Papillae are structures in the skin that can change shape and size. 1462413664980541441.name: UK Centre for Animal Law (A-Law)
1462413664980541441.tweet: Very welcome news that @LSEnews independent scientific review confirms sentience of decapod crustaceans and cephalopod molluscs and @DefraGovUK announced it will amend the Animal Welfare (Sentience) Bill to extend the definition of sentient animals in line with the findings.  https://t.co/YWmHb4YVs0
